SNMP PDU types

Alpha API includes a set of classes, that get mixed into each rfc1157 and rfc1905 SNMP PDU object, to indicate PDU type to which arbitrary object belongs,

class GetRequestPduTypeMixIn()
class GetNextRequestPduTypeMixIn()
class SetRequestPduTypeMixIn()
class GetResponsePduTypeMixIn()
class TrapPduTypeMixIn()
class GetBulkRequestPduTypeMixIn()
class InformRequestPduTypeMixIn()
class ReportPduTypeMixIn()

For API methods implemented by this class, please, refer to the Subsections below.

Subsections

  • API methods to *PduTypeMixIn's
